description: Numbers n such that string 0,5 occurs in the base 9 representation of n but not of n+1.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: Transpose[SequencePosition[Table[If[MemberQ[Partition[IntegerDigits[n,9],2,1],{0,5}],1,0],{n,3000}],{1,0}]][[1]] (* The program uses the SequencePosition function from Mathematica version 10 *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 01 2015 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
